ctu_text: The incentive will be provided at the rate of \u20b9300 per head per month up to the month the girl child attains the age of 15 years. The incentive amount will be paid to the mother of the girl child, preferably to the bank/post office account. Up to two girl children in a family will be covered by the scheme. The CDPO will sanction the incentive with prior approval of the Director of Social Welfare and Social Education.
